definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: I walk around and around the carved stone gates to the library garden.
sentences.chinese: 我繞着通往圖書館花園的石雕大門走了一圈又一圈。

sentences.english: Thrice they passed Unsullied guards, standing as if they had been carved from stone.
sentences.chinese: 有三次他們路過無垢者守衛，他們像石雕般站立着。

sentences.english: Lee is the founder of Taiwanese students to go the famous stone craftsmen.
sentences.chinese: 創始人李走生是閩南著名的石雕工藝師。

sentences.english: In Rock, a cliff out of a stone, have been talking.
sentences.chinese: 在南巖，一座伸出懸崖的石雕，向來被人們津津樂道。

sentences.english: Mausoleum of the level of stone temple architecture, similar to Angkor and Cambodia.
sentences.chinese: 陵廟的層級石雕建築，與柬埔寨吳哥窟相似。

sentences.english: Close inspection shows up the cracks in the stonework.
sentences.chinese: 仔細觀察能看到石雕中的裂縫。

sentences.english: After visiting the Zhenhai Tower, they come to magnificent stone statue.
sentences.chinese: 參觀完鎮海樓之後，他們來到一座精美的石雕像前。

sentences.english: Qingtian nis a county in South Eastern Zhejiang Province reputed as the hometown of Chinese Stone Carvings.
sentences.chinese: 青田是浙江省東南部一個被譽爲中國石雕之鄉的縣。

sentences.english: Quyang to expeditiously formulate measures to save the ancient stone craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 必須儘快制訂措施拯救曲陽石雕這一古老的手工技藝。
石雕的噴泉是簡單樸實的。

sentences.english: Seeing these stone men reminds me of those colossal stone sculptures on Easter Island.
sentences.chinese: 看到這些石人我想到了復活節島上的那些巨型石雕。

sentences.english: It is the peak of the ancient Chinese stone-carving art.
sentences.chinese: 它是我國古代石雕藝術的寶庫。

sentences.english: You can see the tall stone figures and visit the temples of the gods.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到那些高大的石雕像，參觀那些神殿。

sentences.english: These chromatic stone carvings are all made from a whole piece of stone.
sentences.chinese: 這些彩色石雕作品均爲一塊完整的石材雕刻而成。

sentences.english: It is a bust chiseled from a rock.
That Song Dynasty lintel etched with a frenzy of folk scenes?
sentences.chinese: 蝕刻着狂熱民俗場景的宋朝石雕梁？

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
vivid and lifelike (idiom); true to life/realistic
guardian lion, a lion statue traditionally placed at the entrance of Chinese imperial palaces, imperial tombs, temples etc
